paid_date.definition: The date when a payment was made or received
paid_date.business_meaning: Date on which the customer made a payment towards their loan

paid_amount.definition: The amount of money that was paid
paid_amount.business_meaning: Amount paid by the customer towards their loan repayment

reconciliation.definition: The process of comparing data from two or more systems to identify differences
reconciliation.business_meaning: Compare paid dates and amounts between different systems to find discrepancies

uuid.definition: Unique identifier for a loan or customer
uuid.business_meaning: Primary key to match records between systems

successful_repayment.definition: A repayment transaction that completed successfully
successful_repayment.business_meaning: Payment that was processed and confirmed

deleted_record.definition: A record that has been marked as deleted
deleted_record.business_meaning: Record that should be excluded from analysis

unsettled_loan.definition: A loan that has not been fully paid off or closed
unsettled_loan.business_meaning: Loan that is still active and requires payment tracking

nbfc.business_meaning: The company that provided the loan

credin.definition: A specific type of loan order
credin.business_meaning: A type of loan that should be excluded from certain analyses

outstanding_daily.description: Daily snapshot of outstanding loan balances

outstanding_daily_to_repayments.description: Outstanding daily loans connect to repayment records

repayments_to_emi_payment_view.description: Repayment records connect to payment details
